name: Get Dream Keys
description:
A和D控制左右移动,W和S控制上下.

A and D control left and right movement, W and S control up and down.

------

这是一个为了参加jam而做的游戏,分别是The Honest Jam III, UDC Jam #20 and Yogscast Game Jam 2021.

混合了三个主题:Dream, Escape, and Opposites.

一个很简单的平台还算益智的游戏,希望大家喜欢.

第一次能完整做完jam,真开心,直接三杀.

版权声明:

字体:狼人小林

音乐:lowenergygirl

------

This is a game for jam. The jams are The Honest Jam III, UDC Jam #20 and Yogscast Game Jam 2021.

A game made by mixing three themes: Dream, Escape, and Opposites.

A simple puzzle platform game, I hope you like it.

I finished Jam for the first time. I am so happy.

Credit to:

Font: 狼人小林

Music: lowenergygirl

------

我想我需要解释一下三个主题是如何体现在我的游戏里的.因为我不是很擅长英语,如果我的理解错误了,希望你们能指出来.

"opposites":我的理解是有点像一个是猫一个是老鼠,玩家是被追者,npc是追赶者.

"Escape":游戏中的坏人都想抓住玩家,玩家需要找到钥匙才能逃离这一关.

"Dream":这个游戏是发生在小女孩的睡梦中,如果玩家能找到每一关的钥匙,小女孩会做一个美梦,否则就是噩梦.过关或者失败的时候有一个小女孩的睡眠状态的图像.我不确定我画的是否足够像.

------

I think I need to explain how the three themes are reflected in my game. Because I am not very good at English, if my understanding is wrong, I hope you can point it out.

"opposites": My understanding is a bit like a cat and a mouse, the player is the pursued, and the npc is the chaser.

"Escape": The bad guys in the game want to catch the player, and the player needs to find the key to escape this level.

"Dream": This game takes place in a little girl’s sleep. If the player can find the key to each level, the little girl will have a sweet dream, otherwise it will be a nightmare. There is an image of the little girl’s sleep state when the level is passed or failed .I'm not sure if my painting is similar enough.
